title: 1999/79/EC: Council Decision of 18 January 1999 amending Article 3 of Decision 98/198/EC
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 18 January 1999 amending Article 3 of Decision 98/198/EC (1999/79/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
Article 3 of Decision 98/198/EC shall be replaced by the following:
'Article 3
This authorisation shall expire on the date of the entry into force of the Community rules determining what expenditure is not to be eligible for the deduction of value-added tax, in accordance with the first subparagraph of Article 17(6) of Directive 77/388/EEC, but on 31 December 2000 at the latest.`
This Decision shall apply from 1 January 1999.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 January 1999.
For the Council
The President
O. LAFONTAINE
